name: Just quarry on
description:
Guide this mining-droid to the bottom! Well... Only if there is a bottom... Drill yourself down and collect resources to upgrade your machines. There are severall useful upgrades to reach your goal much quicker:

  • The diamond drill lets you drill by holding the left mouse button instead of clicking the blocks individually. 
  • The laser drill is as  quick as the diamond drill, but when you press the right mouse button, you can destroy a bigger radius. This will cost you energy!
  • The engine can be upgraded a few times. With each upgrade your fueltank gets a bigger capacity and you'll get more fuel from coal!

There are 6 different ways to play this game. By choosing one of the following settings you choose when the game ends:

  • play 500 seconds
  • play 1000 seconds
  • play 2000 seconds
  • reach layer 100
  • reach layer 1000
  • reach layer 2500

What are your highscores? Feel free to leave them in the comments!
